name: Token Metrics AI
description: Token Metrics AI (TMAI) is a groundbreaking token that empowers the crypto community with unmatched AI tools and insights. Holders gain access to AI-powered trading bots compatible with centralized and decentralized exchanges, automating trading strategies using proprietary signals and analytics. The TMAI Agent, accessible on Token Metrics, Twitter (X), Telegram, and Discord, provides AI-driven market analysis refined over multiple crypto cycles. Over 50% of TMAI's supply was airdropped to the community, highlighting the commitment to collective ownership. TMAI holders also participate in governance through the for-profit Token Metrics DAO, contributing to the ecosystem's growth.
